questiontext.text:
[Referencia: UPR_VA_NormalCondicionalCalculos]

Sean \(X\sim ~ U(-3.8, 3.8)\) e \(~Y|X=x~\sim \mathbb{N}(\beta_0 +\beta_1x, \sigma^2),\) donde \(\beta_0=0.4\), \(\beta_1 = 1\) y \(\sigma^2 = 0.05\).

Calcular \(E(X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0:0.001}

Calcular \(P(Y\leq 1.09|X=0.4)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.9027:0.001}

Calcular \(E(Y|X=0.4)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.8:0.001}

Calcular \(E(Y)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.4:0.001}

Calcular \(V(X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=4.8133333:0.001}

Calcular \(V(Y|X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.05:0.001}

Calcular \(V(Y)\), recordando que \(V(Y)=\mathbb E\{V(Y\mid X)\}+V(\mathbb E(Y\mid X))\). {1:NUMERICAL:=4.8633333:0.001}

[Referencia: UPR_VA_NormalCondicionalCalculos]

Sean \(X\sim ~ U(-2.5, 2.5)\) e \(~Y|X=x~\sim \mathbb{N}(\beta_0 +\beta_1x, \sigma^2),\) donde \(\beta_0=0.8\), \(\beta_1 = 1\) y \(\sigma^2 = 0.08\).

Calcular \(E(X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0:0.001}

Calcular \(P(Y\leq 3.47|X=2.3)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.9046:0.001}

Calcular \(E(Y|X=2.3)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=3.1:0.001}

Calcular \(E(Y)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.8:0.001}

Calcular \(V(X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=2.0833333:0.001}

Calcular \(V(Y|X)\). {1:NUMERICAL:=0.08:0.001}

Calcular \(V(Y)\), recordando que \(V(Y)=\mathbb E\{V(Y\mid X)\}+V(\mathbb E(Y\mid X))\). {1:NUMERICAL:=2.1633333:0.001}
